root.name: Harvest Moon 3D: A New Beginning
root.description: Harvest Moon: A New Beginning is a followup to Harvest Moon: The Tale of Two Towns, both developed Marvelous Interactive and published by Natsume. The title was released February 23, 2012 in Japan and October 19, 2012 in North America exclusively for the 3DS. New features primarily revolve around customization; for the first time, the home, village and character can all be customized by the player.
